title: Google’s Nest Cam & Floodlight Bundle is 18% Cheaper with this Deal!
description: Boost your home security setup with this deal! The post Google’s Nest Cam & Floodlight Bundle is 18% Cheaper with this Deal! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Boost your home security setup with this deal!
text: Google’s wide selection of Nest products are ideal for folks who want to add a bit of “oomph” to their smart home setup, whether it be for home entertainment systems, or even security platforms. Speaking of the latter, buyers looking to save on the Google Nest Cam might want to check out this deal, which comes with an integrated floodlight feature. The Google Nest Cam with Floodlight comes with several features including  built-in intelligence that lets it tell the difference between a person, animal, and vehicle, 1080p HDR video with night vision, three hours of free event video history, up to an hour of recorded events should there be a power outage, a built-in speaker and mic, and of course motion and activity triggers with the built-in floodlight. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart.
